page.title: 11THE PEOPLE OF WHEATHAMPSTEAD
page.content: When questioned about our block,people gave these answers. Most people we spoke to lived in Wheathampstead , only one person didn't.The next question was whereabouts in Wheathampstead do you live,five people lived in the village,three people lived in the estate and one person lived in Kimpton.Most people liked the medical facilities in the village. Not everybody did their shopping in Wheathampstead.Nearly everyone said 'there's not enough entertainment in the area. Here is a list of things that people would like to see in Wheathampstead. a leisure club,swimming pool,cinema and a park. The last question was approximately how many people would you say live in Wheathampstead. Here are some guesses: 6000 ,8_10,000, and 13_14,000. A lot of people said "I haven't got a clue!"
